items.sentence: Tom seems to prefer spending most of his time alone.
Just tell me what you want me to do and I\'ll do it.
In case of an emergency, get in touch with my agent.
Mary wrote down her phone number and gave it to Tom.
My driving instructor says I should be more patient.
Our bus left at eight, arriving in Boston at eleven.
Take an umbrella with you in case it begins to rain.
This is in one of the largest airports in the world.
You may give this photograph to anyone who wants it.
The only job Tom has ever had is the one he has now.
I saw Tom\'s note that he left on the kitchen table.
I shouldn\'t have accused him of stealing the money.
I just know that I don\'t want to be married to you.
I just met the most beautiful woman I\'ve ever seen.
I just want to know what I\'m getting involved with.
Tom and Mary always seem to be hanging out together.
Tom and Mary entered the classroom at the same time.
Tom and Mary fell in love the moment their eyes met.
Tom called Mary to ask why she wasn\'t at the party.
I would\'ve gone to the movies if I\'d had the time.
